import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\bthe\s+software\b|\bthe\s+system\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\bthe\s+computer\b|\bthe\s+database\b|\bthe\s+tap\b|\bthe\s+magnetic\s+stripe\s+card\b|\bthe\s+hard\s+disk\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\bthe\s+patient\b|\bthe\s+sun\b|\bthe\s+old\b|\bthe\s+technical\s+designers\b|\bthe\s+client\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\bthe\s+database\b|\bthe\s+magnetic\s+stripe\s+card\b|\bthe\s+tap\b|\bthe\s+hard\s+disk\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\bthe\s+aim\s+and\s+purpose\s+of\s+the\s+system\s+to\s+be\s+developed\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\bthe\s+set\s+of\s+shared\s+events,\s+states\s+and\s+values\s+between\s+the\s+connected\s+entities\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(software|system)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[1])

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(device|machine|computer|system)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[1])

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(scientist|engineer|client|patient|sun|old|individual|person)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[1])

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(database|card|disk|stripe|tap|system)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[1])

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(requirement|aim|purpose|goal)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[1])

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(event|state|value|phenomenon)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[1])

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(Software|System)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(Device|Machine|Computer|Printer|Scanner|Monitor|Keyboard|Mouse|Tablet|Laptop|Smartphone|Tablet|Camera|Printer|Scanner|Monitor|Keyboard|Mouse|Tablet|Laptop|Smartphone|Camera)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(Environment|Object|Patient|Sun|Old|Person|Car|House|Tree|Dog|Cat|Bird|Fish|Car|House|Tree|Dog|Cat|Bird|Fish)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches
    
    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(Database|Card|Tap|Disk|Card|Tap|Disk)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(Requirements|Functional|Data|General|Constraints|Assumptions|Rationale|Traceability|Identification|Definitions)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(Events|States|Values|Connected|Entities|Shared)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches
    
    return entities

    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object

    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'(shall|must|should|can) ([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    system_requirements = [f"{req[1]} {req[2]}" for req in system_requirements]
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'(shall|must|should|can) ([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    shared_phenomena = [f"{req[1]} {req[2]}" for req in shared_phenomena]
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

    schema = {

        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\sSystem\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\sshall\s\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Iterate over the schema definition
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)

    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(Correlator|Monitor|Control|System|Interface|GUI|Software|Center|Tactical|Control|System|Center|to|Center)\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [f"The {system}" for system in set([system[1] for system in software_systems])]

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b(one|a|an)\s+(computer|processor|system|device|network|interface|GUI|Monitor|Control|System|Center|to|Center)\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [f"{device[1]}" for device in set(physical_devices)]

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b(a|an)\s+(public|network|patient|sun|old|computer|system|device|network|interface|GUI|Monitor|Control|System|Center|to|Center)\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [f"{object[1]}" for object in set(environment_objects)]

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(Correlator|Monitor|Control|System|Interface|GUI|Software|Center|Tactical|Control|System|Center|to|Center)\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [f"The {system}" for system in set([system[1] for system in external_systems])]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b(can|be|allow|provide|implement|design|execute|transmit|store|expand|access|share|exchange|coordinate|control)\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [f"{requirement}" for requirement in set(system_requirements)]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b(data|information|requests|traffic|control|device|processing|capability|expansion|peripherals|communications)\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [f"{phenomenon}" for phenomenon in set(shared_phenomena)]

    return entities

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the entity types and their corresponding regular expressions
    entity_types = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ system\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ device\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ user\b|\b[A-Z][a-z]+ home\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ interface\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ configuration\b|\b[A-Z][a-z]+ training\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ graphical user interface\b'
    }

    # Initialize the extracted entities dictionary
    extracted_entities = {entity_type: [] for entity_type in entity_types.keys()}

    # Tokenize the sentence
    tokens = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)

    # Iterate over the entity types and extract entities
    for entity_type, regex in entity_types.items():
        for token in tokens:
            if re.match(regex, token):
                extracted_entities[entity_type].append(token)

    # Return the extracted entities as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(extracted_entities)
```

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ infrastructure|The [A-Z][a-z]+ system|The CCTNS system|This Center-to-Center infrastructure|The Tactical Control System)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'(TMCs|a database|a magnetic stripe card|a tap|hard disk)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'(the patient|the sun|the old|TMCs)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'(the Incident GUI|a single data store \(database\)|a database|a magnetic stripe card|a tap|hard disk)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'(ensure high scalability and performance|have sufficient throughput to support the processing requirements of the selected data link|to exchange device control information between TMCs)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'(traffic data|device control information|data|the data|the processing requirements of the selected data link)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:the\s+)?([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+system"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+AVs"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+payloads"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+CSCIs"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"will\s+provide\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+access\s+to\s+all\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+states"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"distributed\s+processing"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'the device (status requestor|status requestor and center)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'these (interfaces|interface)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'an existing (system|system in a system specific format)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'(have a maximum delay time of \d+ second|provide the functionality to have a maximum delay time of \d+ second)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'(time synchronous basis|request basis|other systems|network identifier|device type|days commands accepted|times commands accepted|information for command timeframe request|the data)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ System)', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ and [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'([a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'([a-z]+ to [a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'([a-z]+ [a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(The|A)\s+(Remote|Incident|Correlator|GUI)\s+(GUI|System)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] + ' ' + match[2] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(hardware|device|interface)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|a)\s+(second|existing|patient|sun|old)\s+(interface|system)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[1] + ' ' + match[2] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(the|an)\s+(existing|database|magnetic|stripe|card|tap|hard|disk)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[1] + ' ' + match[2] for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(specific|goal|oriented|hardware|configuration|tables)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(the|a)\s+(data|configuration|requested|configuration|requested|configuration)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match[1] + ' ' + match[2] for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return entities

# Test the function

    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)

    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match for match in environment_object_matches if match not in entities['Software System'] and match not in entities['Physical Device']]

    # External System

    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(data|information|map|system|device|card|disk|stripe|tap|hard|GUI|GUIs|GUIs|GUI)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match for match in shared_phenomena_matches if match not in entities['Software System'] and match not in entities['Physical Device'] and match not in entities['Environment Object'] and match not in entities['External System'] and match not in entities['System Requirements']]

    return entities

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema and entity types
    schema = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Tokenize the input sentence
    tokens = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)

    # Identify the entities for each type
    for token in tokens:
        if token in ['system', 'software']:
            schema['Software System'].append(token)
        elif token in ['device', 'controller', 'monitor']:
            schema['Physical Device'].append(token)
        elif token in ['patient', 'sun', 'old']:
            schema['Environment Object'].append(token)
        elif token in ['database', 'card', 'disk']:
            schema['External System'].append(token)
        elif token in ['requirement', 'aim', 'purpose']:
            schema['System Requirements'].append(token)
        elif token in ['event', 'state', 'value']:
            schema['Shared Phenomena'].append(token)

    # Create a dictionary with the extracted entities
    result = {}
    for key, value in schema.items():
        if value:
            result[key] = value

    # Return the dictionary as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',

    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():

        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'(\w+\s\w+\sSystem|the\s\w+\sSystem)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'(\w+\sdevice|a\s\w+\sdevice)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'(\w+\sobject|the\s\w+\sobject)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)

    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)

## Code
```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-zA-Z0-9\s]+ Software)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-zA-Z0-9\s]+ Device)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-zA-Z0-9\s]+ Object)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-zA-Z0-9\s]+ System)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'(shall|must|will|can|is required to|is able to|is supposed to|is expected to|is intended to|is able to|is supposed to|is expected to|is intended to) ([A-Z][a-zA-Z0-9\s]+)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match[1] for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'(shared|common|mutual|common|mutual|shared|common|mutual|shared|common|mutual) ([A-Z][a-zA-Z0-9\s]+)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match[1] for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b(Tactical Control System|Watchdog processes|Master Correlator Control Computer|Correlator Power Control Computer)\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b(UAV|equipment|computer workstation|Human Computer Interface)\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b(computer workstation|the sun|the old)\b',
        'External System': r'\b(database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk|workstation and peripheral equipment maintenance software)\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b(perform software debug and monitoring|monitor the uplink and downlink|executing workstation and peripheral equipment maintenance software|displaying appropriate status results|conduct workstation and peripheral equipment maintenance|monitor Correlator Power Control Computer health)\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b(appropriate status results)\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Iterate over the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    return result

        'System Requirements': r'\b(perform|conduct|debug|monitoring|upgrades|fault detection/location|software debug and monitoring|software upgrades|workstation and peripheral equipment maintenance|actions taken by external system upon hard failures are TBD)\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b(shared events|states|values|connected entities)\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    return result

        'Software System': r'\bThe\s\w+\sSystem\b|\b\w+\sSystem\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\sinput\sbeta\w+\b|\b\w+\sdevice\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Iterate over the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    return result

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(Software|System)\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in software_system_matches:
        entities['Software System'].append(match[1].strip())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(Physical|Device)\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[1].strip())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(Environment|Object)\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match[1].strip())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(External|System)\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match[1].strip())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(System|Requirements)\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match[1].strip())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(Shared|Phenomena)\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match[1].strip())

    return entities

        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',

    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Iterate over the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches

        # Add the matches to the result dictionary

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(Tactical Control System|System)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(Tactical Control System hardware|Human Computer Interface|computer workstation)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(individuals|team members|operator|the sun|the old|the patient)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(execute periodic Fault Detection/Location|perform software upgrades|ensure reliability|evaluate and allocate tasks)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(level of interaction|corrective and preventive maintenance|periodic performance tests|upgrades)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b\w+\b',
        'External System': r'\b\w+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\s\w+\s\w+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\s\w+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type in the schema
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[entity_type] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)

## Code
```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) shall provide the capability to ([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) is a critical component in the ([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) is an entity in the real world'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) is a manually designed domain that can store data messages'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'The system shall provide the capability to ([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(1))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) includes the ([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(2))

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):

        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []

    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ device)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ database)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?system"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?device"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?user|operator|patient|sun|old"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?database|card|tap|disk"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"easy to use and intuitive|easily adjustable|full complementary control|smooth transition"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?message|data|information|engagement|learning experience"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group())

    return entities

# Test the function

```

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema and entity types
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ hardware\b|\b[A-Z][a-z]+ device\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ link\b|\b[A-Z][a-z]+ payload\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ database\b|\b[A-Z][a-z]+ card\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ to ensure\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ signals\b'
    }

    # Tokenize the input sentence
    tokens = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)

    # Initialize the extracted entities
    extracted_entities = {entity_type: [] for entity_type in schema.keys()}

    # Identify the entity types for each token
    for token in tokens:
        for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
            if re.match(pattern, token):
                extracted_entities[entity_type].append(token)

    # Return the extracted entities as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(extracted_entities)

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\bThe\s+system\b'
    if re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence):
        entities['Software System'].append('The system')

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(a|an)\s+(power|uninterruptible)\s+(switch|supply|equipment)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    for match in physical_device_matches:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(match[1] + ' ' + match[2])

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(workstation|patient|sun|old)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    for match in environment_object_matches:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(match)

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(database|magnetic|stripe|card|tap|hard\sdisk)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    for match in external_system_matches:
        entities['External System'].append(match)

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(have|conduct|change|connect|be|provide|require)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    for match in system_requirements_matches:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(match + ' ' + sentence[sentence.find(match):sentence.find(match) + 10])

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(state|event|value|equipment|supply|layout|constraints)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    for match in shared_phenomena_matches:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(match)

    return entities

        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[a-z]+ to [a-z]+ [a-z]+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[a-z]+ [a-z]+ [a-z]+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    return result

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System

    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ board|daughter board|carrier boards|busses|processor)', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system|database|card|disk|software)', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'(shall|shall be|shall utilize|shall provide|shall use|shall have|shall be able to|shall be required to)', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'(communicate|transmit|disseminate|utilize|provide|use|have|be able to|be required to)', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Tokenize the sentence
    tokens = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)

    # Define the entity types
    entity_types = {
        'Software System': ['system', 'software', 'application'],
        'Physical Device': ['device', 'board', 'correlator'],
        'Environment Object': ['object', 'entity', 'thing'],
        'External System': ['database', 'card', 'disk'],
        'System Requirements': ['requirement', 'aim', 'purpose'],
        'Shared Phenomena': ['event', 'state', 'value']
    }

    # Initialize the extracted entities
    extracted_entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Extract entities for each type
    for token in tokens:
        for entity_type, keywords in entity_types.items():
            if any(keyword in token.lower() for keyword in keywords):
                extracted_entities[entity_type].append(token)

    # Return the extracted entities
    return extracted_entities

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\system\b', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system

    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\hardware\b|\b\w+\s\device\b', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device

    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\the\b', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object

    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\database\b|\b\w+\s\card\b|\b\w+\s\disk\b', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\to\b|\b\w+\s\ensure\b|\b\w+\s\should\b', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\data\b|\b\w+\s\records\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary

        entities = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the entities to the result dictionary
        result[key] = entities

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    result_json = json.dumps(result)

import re

        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(0))

    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(0))

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema definition
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\bThe\s+system\b|\bthe\s+system\b|\bSystem\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\bdevice\b|\bdevice\s+with\b|\bdevice\s+in\b|\bdevice\s+for\b|\bdevice\s+to\b|\bdevice\s+of\b|\bdevice\s+on\b|\bdevice\s+at\b|\bdevice\s+from\b|\bdevice\s+with\b|\bdevice\s+in\b|\bdevice\s+for\b|\bdevice\s+to\b|\bdevice\s+of\b|\bdevice\s+on\b|\bdevice\s+at\b|\bdevice\s+from\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\bthe\s+patient\b|\bthe\s+sun\b|\bthe\s+old\b',
        'External System': r'\bdatabase\b|\bmagnetic\s+stripe\s+card\b|\btap\b|\bhard\s+disk\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\baim\s+and\s+purpose\b|\baim\s+and\s+purpose\s+of\b|\baim\s+and\s+purpose\s+to\b|\baim\s+and\s+purpose\s+for\b|\baim\s+and\s+purpose\s+of\b|\baim\s+and\s+purpose\s+on\b|\baim\s+and\s+purpose\s+at\b|\baim\s+and\s+purpose\s+from\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\bset\s+of\s+shared\s+events\b|\bset\s+of\s+shared\s+states\b|\bset\s+of\s+shared\s+values\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, value in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(value, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Return the result as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?system|software"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Software System'] = [match.strip() for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(?:the )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?hardware|device"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match.strip() for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(?:the )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?environment|object"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match.strip() for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?system|database|card|disk"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['External System'] = [match.strip() for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s+be\s+capable\s+of|support|allow|provide|ensure"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match.strip() for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?(?:[A-Z][a-z]+ )?data|information|events|states|values"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match.strip() for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return entities

def extract_entities(sentence):

    schema = {
        'Software System': [],

        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],

        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Tokenize the input sentence

    for token in tokens:
        if token in ['system', 'software', 'program', 'application']:
            schema['Software System'].append(token)
        elif token in ['device', 'machine', 'equipment', 'hardware']:
            schema['Physical Device'].append(token)
        elif token in ['environment', 'object', 'entity', 'thing']:
            schema['Environment Object'].append(token)
        elif token in ['database', 'system', 'network', 'service']:
            schema['External System'].append(token)
        elif token in ['requirement', 'need', 'goal', 'objective']:
            schema['System Requirements'].append(token)
        elif token in ['event', 'state', 'value', 'phenomenon']:
            schema['Shared Phenomena'].append(token)

    # Extract entities that match the schema definition
    entities = {
        'Software System': schema['Software System'],
        'Physical Device': schema['Physical Device'],
        'Environment Object': schema['Environment Object'],
        'External System': schema['External System'],
        'System Requirements': schema['System Requirements'],
        'Shared Phenomena': schema['Shared Phenomena']
    }

    # Return the extracted entities as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(entities)

def extract_entities(sentence):

        'Software System': r'\bThe\s\w+\ssoftware\b|\b\w+\ssoftware\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b\w+\sdevice\b|\b\w+\scomputer\b',

        'System Requirements': r'\b\w+\srequirement\b|\b\w+\saim\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b\w+\sstate\b|\b\w+\sevent\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Iterate over the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    return result

        if token in ['and', 'or', 'but', 'for', 'with', 'from', 'to', 'in', 'on', 'at', 'by', 'of']:
            continue
        if token in ['of', 'to', 'in', 'on', 'at', 'by']:
            continue
        if token in ['be', 'have', 'can', 'will', 'shall']:
            entity_types['System Requirements'].append(token)
        elif token in ['The', 'a', 'an']:
            entity_types['Software System'].append(token)
        elif token in ['high', 'availability', 'type', 'general', 'purpose', 'computer', 'COTS', 'operating', 'system', 'hardware', 'status', 'signals', 'interface']:
            entity_types['Physical Device'].append(token)
        elif token in ['payload', 'AV', 'data', 'links']:
            entity_types['Environment Object'].append(token)
        elif token in ['receive', 'process', 'disseminate', 'video', 'telemetry', 'data', 'perform', 'mission', 'planning', 'monitor', 'control']:
            entity_types['System Requirements'].append(token)
        elif token in ['Correlator', 'Power', 'Control', 'Computer']:
            entity_types['Software System'].append(token)
        elif token in ['Correlator', 'Power', 'Control', 'Computer', 'hardware']:
            entity_types['Physical Device'].append(token)

    # Return the extracted entities as a dictionary
    return entity_types

import re
from collections import defaultdict

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema and entity types
    schema = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Tokenize the input sentence
    tokens = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)

    # Identify the entity types for each token in the sentence
    for token in tokens:
        if token in ['system', 'software', 'program', 'application']:
            schema['Software System'].append(token)
        elif token in ['device', 'machine', 'equipment', 'hardware']:
            schema['Physical Device'].append(token)
        elif token in ['environment', 'object', 'entity', 'thing']:
            schema['Environment Object'].append(token)
        elif token in ['database', 'system', 'network', 'service']:
            schema['External System'].append(token)
        elif token in ['requirement', 'need', 'goal', 'objective']:
            schema['System Requirements'].append(token)
        elif token in ['event', 'state', 'value', 'phenomenon']:
            schema['Shared Phenomena'].append(token)

    # Extract entities that match the schema definition
    entities = {
        'Software System': schema['Software System'],
        'Physical Device': schema['Physical Device'],
        'Environment Object': schema['Environment Object'],
        'External System': schema['External System'],
        'System Requirements': schema['System Requirements'],
        'Shared Phenomena': schema['Shared Phenomena']
    }

    # Return the extracted entities as a JSON string
    return json.dumps(entities)

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b(Tactical Control System|Monitor and Control System)\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b(Human Computer Interface|equipment|correlator|power|monitor|control)\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b(computer workstation|workstation|peripheral|network|failure)\b',
        'External System': r'\b(database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk|HCI)\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b(perform software debug and monitoring|conduct data link terminal maintenance|perform fault detection/location (FD/L)|conduct workstation and peripheral equipment maintenance|allow correlator power monitoring and control to continue)\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Iterate over the schema
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    return result

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("This requirement is to allow correlator power monitoring and control to continue in the event of an Monitor and Control System network failure."))

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(CCTNS|Tactical Control|system)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(tap|hard disk|database|magnetic stripe card)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[1] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(patient|sun|old|user|users|personnel)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[1] for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(pages|special error pages|database|tap|hard disk|magnetic stripe card)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[1] for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(automatically checked for errors and corrected when possible|filter the error message stream|resolve the error)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(error messages|The content of error messages|actions|All digital messages received)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return json.dumps(entities)

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+system'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+device'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+system'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+shall\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [f'{match[0]} {match[1]}' for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+messages'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(Tactical|Digital|System|Software)\s+(Control|Home|System|Application)\s+(Software|System)\b'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(0))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(User|Device|Network|System)\s+(Identifier|Command|Control|Request)\b'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(0))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(User|Patient|Device|System)\b'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(0))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(The|A|An)\s+(Database|Card|Disk|System)\b'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(0))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(log|track|non-proprietary|unlimited|enhancement|defect)\b'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(0))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(messaging|monitor|control|traffic)\b'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(0))

    return entities

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("Software shall be provided that allows an authorized user full access to all messaging, monitor, and control traffic."))

        # Use regular expression to find all matches

        # Add the matches to the result dictionary

```python
import re
from collections import defaultdict

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema and entity types
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b(Tactical Control System|The Tactical Control System|the Tactical Control System system)\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b(processor hardware|temperature|voltage|computational performance|computational error rates|Human Computer Interface|computer workstation|Tactical Control System hardware)\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b(the operator|the patient|the sun|the old)\b',
        'External System': r'\b(database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk)\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b(detecting|reporting on|automatically taking action to remedy or lessen the impact|perform fault detection/location|execute periodic Fault Detection/Location|perform software debug and monitoring|provide the operator a caution and warning diagnostic)\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b(a caution and warning diagnostic)\b'
    }

    # Tokenize the input sentence
    tokens = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)

    # Initialize the extracted entities
    extracted_entities = defaultdict(list)

    # Identify the entity types for each token
    for token in tokens:
        for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
            if re.search(pattern, token):
                extracted_entities[entity_type].append(token)

    # Return the extracted entities in the format of a JSON string
    return {entity_type: entities for entity_type, entities in extracted_entities.items()}

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:\w+\s+)?\w+(?:\s+and\s+)?\w+(?:\s+and\s+)?\w+"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"the\s+(?:hardware|device|part)\s+of\s+the\s+\w+"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+)\s+Correlator\s+Monitor\s+and\s+Control\s+System"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s+be\s+able\s+to\s+(?:perform|have|be)\s+indefinitely\s+without\s+complete\s+loss\s+of\s+service"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"total\s+failure\s+of\s+primary\s+and\s+backup\s+power"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

# Test the function
sentence = "The hardware part of the EVLA Correlator Monitor and Control System shall be able to perform indefinitely without complete loss of service, except in the event of total failure of primary and backup power."
print(extract_entities(sentence))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s(hardware|device|equipment|machine|system|system\sand|and\sdevice)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[0].strip() for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s(the|a|an)\s([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = [match[2].strip() for match in environment_object_matches]

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s(database|card|disk|tape|file|system|system\sand|and\ssystem)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[0].strip() for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s(shall|must|should|can|will|is|are|has|have|had|do|does|did|be|been|being|have|has|had|do|does|did|be|been|being)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match[0].strip() for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s(shared|common|same|similar|related|associated|connected|linked|coupled|tied|bound|bundled|merged|merged|fused|fused|combined|combined|unified|unified|integrated|integrated|coordinated|coordinated|synchronized|synchronized|aligned|aligned|matched|matched|correlated|correlated|correlating|correlating|correlates|correlates)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match[0].strip() for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return entities

    }

    for token in tokens:

            if re.search(pattern, token):
                result[entity_type].append(token)

    # Return the extracted entities in the format of a JSON string
    return {entity_type: entities for entity_type, entities in result.items()}

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+|the [A-Z][a-z]+|a [A-Z][a-z]+|an [A-Z][a-z]+)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'(the [A-Z][a-z]+|a [A-Z][a-z]+|an [A-Z][a-z]+|a [A-Z][a-z]+ device|a [A-Z][a-z]+ system)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'(the [A-Z][a-z]+|a [A-Z][a-z]+|an [A-Z][a-z]+|the user|the customer)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'(a database|a magnetic stripe card|a tap|hard disk)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'(log any defects|enhancement requests|track thereafter|a complete diagnostic package|customer support)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'(shared events|shared states|shared values)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ software)', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system

    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ device)', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device

    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object

    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system)', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'(shall|must|should|can|will|is required to|is able to|has to|have to|need to|be able to|be required to|be able to|be required to|has to|have to|need to|shall|must|should|can|will)(\s\w+){1,}', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [item[1] for item in system_requirements]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ events|states|values)', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

# Test the function

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ hardware)', sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_devices

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_objects

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_systems

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ to [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    system_requirements += re.findall(r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+)', sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = []
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities

import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Define the schema
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'Physical Device': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'Environment Object': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'External System': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'System Requirements': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b'
    }

    # Initialize the result dictionary
    result = {key: [] for key in schema.keys()}

    # Loop through each entity type
    for key, pattern in schema.items():
        # Use regular expression to find all matches
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence)
        # Add the matches to the result dictionary
        result[key] = matches

    # Convert the result dictionary to a JSON string
    return json.dumps(result)

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(The|the)\s+(Correlator\s+Monitor\s+and\s+Control\s+System|CCTNS|Tactical\s+Control\s+System)\b'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(2))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(The|the)\s+(sun|tap|hard\s+disk|database|magnetic\s+stripe\s+card|patient|old)\b'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(2))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(The|the)\s+(operator|user|patient|old)\b'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(2))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(The|the)\s+(database|magnetic\s+stripe\s+card|tap|hard\s+disk)\b'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(2))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(ensure|restrict|needs|shall|should)\s+(high\s+standards\s+of\s+security|access|control|security|access\s+control)\b'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(0))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(password|access|security|control)\b'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(0))

    return entities

# Test the function
sentence = "The Correlator Monitor and Control System needs a robust security mechanism in place so that unauthorized users are not allowed access."
print(extract_entities(sentence))

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(The|the)\s+(Tactical|tactical)\s+(Control|control)\s+(System|system)\s*(software|software)?'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group())

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(software|hardware)\b'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group())

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(Operator|operator|users|user|admin-users|admin-user|personnel|development|testing|maintenance|operations)\b'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group())

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(database|database|magnetic|stripe|card|tap|hard|disk)\b'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group())

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(restrict|allow|set|allocate|access|via|password|protection)\b'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group())

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(user|groups|profiles|capability|access|password|protection)\b'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group())

    return entities
