```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+\s*\w*)\s*system"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(is|are|has|have)\s*(a|an)\s*(physical|real)\s*world\s*device"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(is|are|has|have)\s*(an)\s*(entity|object)\s*in\s*the\s*real\s*world"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(is|are|has|have)\s*(a|an)\s*(manually\s*designed|domain)\s*that\s*can\s*store\s*data\s*messages"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(shall|must|should|can)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(0))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(is|are|has|have)\s*(a|an)\s*(set)\s*of\s*(shared|common)\s*events,\s*states\s*and\s*values"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1))

    return entities
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    # Tokenize the sentence
    tokens = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)

    # Define the entity types
    entity_types = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Extract entities
    for token in tokens:
        if token.lower() in ['system', 'software', 'device', 'environment', 'external']:
            entity_types['Software System'].append(token)
        elif token.lower() in ['device', 'device', 'household', 'switches']:
            entity_types['Physical Device'].append(token)
        elif token.lower() in ['user', 'patient', 'sun', 'old']:
            entity_types['Environment Object'].append(token)
        elif token.lower() in ['database', 'card', 'tap', 'disk']:
            entity_types['External System'].append(token)
        elif token.lower() in ['requirement', 'aim', 'purpose']:
            entity_types['System Requirements'].append(token)
        elif token.lower() in ['event', 'state', 'value']:
            entity_types['Shared Phenomena'].append(token)

    # Return the extracted entities as a dictionary
    return entity_types
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(\w+\s*\w*)\s*system"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(1))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(is|are)\s*a\s*(physical|device)"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(is|are)\s*an\s*(environment|object)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(is|are)\s*a\s*(external|system)"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(1))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"the\s*system\sto\s*(be|have|provide)\s*(\w+\s*\w*)"
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(3))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+\s*\w*)\s*(is|are)\s*a\s*(shared|phenomena)"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1))

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(the|a|an)\s+(CCTNS|EVLA|Correlator|Monitor|Control|System)\b'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[1] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(device|tap|hard disk|magnetic stripe card|database|file|record|correspondence)\b'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(user|patient|sun|old|personnel)\b'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(database|file|record|correspondence|DMS|center)\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(require|need|must|should|can|will|is|are|be|has|have|had|do|does|did|to|for|with|from|at|by|on|in)\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(user-friendliness|performance|access|level|privileges|basis|control|development|testing|maintenance|correlator|monitor|control|system|EVLA|CCTNS)\b'
    system_requirements_matches += re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(command|identifier|username|password|control|device|network|DMS|center|user|access|level|privileges|basis|control|development|testing|maintenance|correlator|monitor|control|system|EVLA|CCTNS)\b'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
import re

    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
```

```python
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:\w+\s+)?\w+(?:\s+and\s+)?\w+(?:\s+and\s+)?\w+"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"a\s+\w+"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"a\s+\w+"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"a\s+\w+"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s+have\s+the\s+ability\s+to"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"delete\s+a\s+previously\s+entered\s+\w+"

    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches
```

        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b(a|an|the)\s+(device|computer|machine|equipment|hardware)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)

    entities['Environment Object'] = [f'the {object}' for object in environment_objects]

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b(a|an|the)\s+(database|card|tap|disk|system|network|server|computer)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities['External System'] = [f'the {system}' for system in external_systems]

    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b(can|should|must|will|shall)\s+(add|change|edit|delete|update|modify|track|log|enhance|improve|provide|designate|interact)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'\b(The|the)\s+(Tactical|CCTNS|EVLA|GUI)\s+(Control|Correlator|Monitor|System)\s*(and|or)\s*(Control|Monitor|System)\s*(System)?'
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities['Software System'].append(software_system_match.group(0))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'\b(The|the)\s+(operator|user|users|user groups|administrator)\s*(s)?'
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities['Physical Device'].append(physical_device_match.group(0))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'\b(The|the)\s+(operator|user|users|user groups|administrator|sun|old|patient)\s*(s)?'
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities['Environment Object'].append(environment_object_match.group(0))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'\b(The|the)\s+(database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk|EVLA Correlator Monitor and Control System)\s*(s)?'
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities['External System'].append(external_system_match.group(0))

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b(The|the)\s+(administrator|user|users|user groups|administrator)\s*(shall|must|have|allow|restrict|block)\s*(all|selectively)\s*(access|limit|delete)\s*(to|for)\s*(all|specified|users|user groups)\s*(or|and)\s*(selectively|by)\s*(user|users)'
    system_requirements_match = re.search(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    if system_requirements_match:
        entities['System Requirements'].append(system_requirements_match.group(0))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'\b(The|the)\s+(access|limit|delete|block)\s*(to|for)\s*(all|specified|users|user groups)\s*(or|and)\s*(selectively|by)\s*(user|users)'
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities['Shared Phenomena'].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(0))

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = software_system_matches
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ device)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = physical_device_matches
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches
    
    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ [A-Z][a-z]+ system)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = external_system_matches
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ requirements)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = system_requirements_matches
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Z][a-z]+ phenomena)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena_matches
    
    return entities
``` 

```python
    external_system_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]*\b'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]*\b'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        'Software System': [],
        'Physical Device': [],
        'Environment Object': [],
        'External System': [],
        'System Requirements': [],
        'Shared Phenomena': []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s(system|software)'
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Software System'] = [match[0] for match in software_system_matches]

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s(device)'
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Physical Device'] = [match[0] for match in physical_device_matches]

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)'
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Environment Object'] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s(database|card|disk|stripe|tap|hard disk)'
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities['External System'] = [match[0] for match in external_system_matches]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s(shall|must|should|will|can|is|are|has|have|be|been|being|been|being|have|has|is|are|shall|must|should|will|can)'
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities['System Requirements'] = [match[0] for match in system_requirements_matches]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r'([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s(event|state|value|values|events|states)'
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = [match[0] for match in shared_phenomena_matches]

    return entities

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("Complete and comprehensible hardware systems specifications and configuration information shall be readily available."))
```

```python
    entities['External System'] = external_system

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\s\w+\b', sentence)
    entities['Shared Phenomena'] = shared_phenomena

    return entities
```
